analysis.description:
Crowdsale.finishMinting (/unique_chucks/6/0x42ebb2fd690bbfd4a8d818830b7e884b9b62f249.sol#338-345) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/6/0x42ebb2fd690bbfd4a8d818830b7e884b9b62f249.sol#342-343)

Crowdsale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x42ebb2fd690bbfd4a8d818830b7e884b9b62f249.sol#346-451) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,numTokens) (/unique_chucks/6/0x42ebb2fd690bbfd4a8d818830b7e884b9b62f249.sol#445-446)

Crowdsale.mint (/unique_chucks/6/0x42ebb2fd690bbfd4a8d818830b7e884b9b62f249.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/6/0x42ebb2fd690bbfd4a8d818830b7e884b9b62f249.sol)
